casebody.data:
Thursday, March 10, 1994

MOTION DOCKET

93-1102. Cramer v. Petrie.

Hancock County, No. 5-92-47. This cause is pending before the court on the certification of conflict by the Court of Appeals for Hancock County. Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae, state of Ohio and Ohio Department of Human Services, for leave to participate in oral argument,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to participate in oral argument be, and the same is hereby, granted, provided the amicus curiae shares time allotted to appellees.
